# resolveProperties

Await all of the properties of a Deferrable object

## Import

```ts
import { resolveProperties } from "@aa-sdk/core";
```

## Parameters

### object

`Deferrable<T>`

- a Deferrable object

## Returns

`Promise<T>`
the object with its properties resolved
